title: One Star Story (band)
text:
One Star Story was a power pop band from Missouri. consisting of lead vocalist and lyricist Vanessa Rose, guitarist Willard Vastine, bass guitarist Bryant Babbitt, drummer Geno Valloni, and touring guitarist Zack Person. The band formed in 2003.
Their latest release, The Empty Room (EP), was produced by Stephen Christian from Anberlin


== Discography ==


=== EPs ===
One Star Story EP (2007)
The Empty Room EP (2008)
